Class ContentDownloader

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ContentDownloader getInstance()
        Returns the existing instance of ContentDownloader. If an instance of ContentDownloader exists already, the instance will be returned. See Singleton pattern
        Returns:
        the instance of ContentDownloader

      • requestAllStories

        public void requestAllStories()
        Requests the meta data from all stories on the server. See API documentation for the returned attributes of each existing story. Requested meta data will be saved in the ArrayList allStoriesData. This includes a map with the meta data of each story and the parameter 'already_downloaded' which marks downloaded stories.

      • requestAllStoriesWithParameter

        public ArrayList<Story> requestAllStoriesWithParameter(String queryParameter)
        Requests the meta data from all stories with a given paramenter. See API documentation for the returned attributes of each existing story. Requested meta data will be saved in the ArrayList allStoriesData. This includes a map with the meta data of each story and the parameter 'already_downloaded' which marks downloaded stories.
        Parameters:
        queryParameter - the Query Parameter, can be for example: id, title, author, size_max, creation_date_min, creation_date_max, location or radius.
        Returns:

      • downloadStory

        public void downloadStory(int id)
        Download of a single story specified by the id. Server returns the XML which includes media data with absolute URI.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the story to download

      • getAllStoriesData

        public ArrayList<Story> getAllStoriesData()
        Method returns the list of all requested stories (with meta data). If this method was called and no list of stories were requested before, the stories will be requested from the server and the list will be returned.
        Returns:
        list of requested stories with meta data

      • getDownloadedStories

        public ArrayList<Story> getDownloadedStories()
        Method returns the list with all downloaded stories.
        Returns:
        list of all downloaded stories

      • parseMediaDataFromXML

        public HashMap<String,String> parseMediaDataFromXML(String path)
        Media data from the given xml is parsed. The image or video files are returned in a map with their id and the path to the respective file.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the xml file
        Returns:
        map with id and path to the respective media file

      • deleteStory

        public void deleteStory(int id)
        The content of a story specified by its id will be deleted recursively. In the list 'allStoriesData' this story will be marked as not downloaded.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the story to delete
